first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
first_interaction.text: Hinto! Hindi ka na makakalapit kay Erwin.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
first_interaction.text: Tapos na ang oras ninyo. Kailangan namin siyang ihiwalay.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
repeated_interaction.text: Sabi ko na, tapos na ang oras ninyo.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 2
first_interaction.text: Hindi na kayo makakausap ni Erwin.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 2
first_interaction.text: May mga bagay na kailangan naming gawin.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 2
repeated_interaction.text: Hindi na kayo makakausap ni Erwin.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Nakakalungkot naman yung nangyari kay Erwin.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard 3
first_interaction.text: Pero ganun talaga ang buhay. May mga bagay na hindi natin kontrolado.
